channel.title: Looking for web designers
channel.description:
Looking for web designers/front-end developers willing to take freelance work on a semi-regular basis. Must be able to meet agreed deadlines (I understand many here are students etc. and that's fine, all deadlines will be agreed before starting individual projects, but they must be respected) Up to you when you take projects and how many. Compensation is very decent, but of course I can't sell things on this forum so hit me up at sam@pizzey.me - bring examples of your work and desired rates.
<3

item.title: Looking for web designers
